titles.title: Clean Ocean Preservation Act of 2003
To establish the HARS-specific PCB effects level, expressed in a certain Memorandum of Agreement issued by the Environmental Protection Agency and the Corps of Engineers, as a final criterion.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 1/7/2003--Introduced. Clean Ocean Preservation Act of 2003- Establishes an effects level of poly-chlorinated biphenyls (PCBs) for remediation material at the Historic Area Remediation Site (HARS) off the coast of New Jersey.Requires any Environmental Protection Agency rule concerning such sediments to be at least as protective of human health and the environment as the established level.
